column2: When you enter an unexplored room…
You are attacked by a monster (roll on T-24).
You find a treasure (roll on T-25).
You find a special dungeon feature (roll on T-30).
You run into a trap (roll on T-31).
A monster (roll on T-24 with a +6 bonus) is guarding a big treasure (roll two times on T-25 with a +10 bonus).
After activating a trap (roll on T-31) you are ambushed by a monster (roll on T-24). You are automatically surprised.
A monster (roll on T-24) is guarding a feature (roll on T-25).
A trap (roll on T-31) protects a feature (roll on T-25).
